title: Ep. 298: Marsilio Ficino on Love (Part Two)
description:
Continuing on Commentary on Plato's Symposium on Love with guest Peter Adamson. We consider F's views on beauty and fill out his neo-Platonic epistemology.

Get more at partiallyexaminedlife.com. Visit partiallyexaminedlife.com/support to get ad-free episodes and tons of bonus discussion.

We'll be live-streaming video for our big ep. 300 on Friday, Aug. 19 at 8pm ET. More info at partiallyexaminedlife.com/pel-live.

Sponsors: Learn about St. John's College at sjc.edu/pel. Get 10% off a month of therapy at BetterHelp.com/partially. Maximize the impact of your charitable giving via GiveWell.org; choose "podcast" and enter "Partially Examined Life."
